There is no workaround at the moment, but once we get fixed this work item:

http://phpexcel.codeplex.com/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=10861

it should be possible to use e.g. getColumnDimension('A:ET')->setAutoSize(true) to autosize each of the columns in the range A:ET.

This is what you are asking for so there is no need to raise any additional feature request.
